data.title: WVPB-TV Sign-off

data.text:
1989 (as WPBY-TV)[]

Sign-on[]

Good morning. WPBY now begins another day of public television service. WPBY-TV Huntington, Charleston, West Virginia is licensed to the West Virginia Educational Broadcasting Authority, which operates the state's three public television and eight public radio stations. Our broadcast center and offices are located on Third Avenue, in Huntington, and at 301 Blackwood Avenue, in Nitro. WPBY is seen throughout West Virginia on channel 33, transmitting from atop Barker Ridge, near Milton. WPBY is a member of the Public Broadcasting Service, and the Southern Educational Communications Association. A portion of our programming is electronically or mechanically reproduced. Stay with us for another day of programs that instruct, enlighten, inform, and entertain on WPBY-TV Huntington, Charleston.

Sign-off[]

WPBY-TV now concludes another day of public television service for the West Virginia, Kentucky and Ohio area. WPBY is licensed to the West Virginia Educational Broadcasting Authority, which operates the state's three public television and eight public radio stations. We serve all of West Virginia on channel 33, transmitting from atop Barker Ridge, near Milton. Our broadcast center and offices are located on Third Avenue, in Huntington, and at 301 Blackwood Avenue, in Nitro. WPBY is a member of the Public Broadcasting Service, and the Southern Educational Communications Association. We hope you've enjoyed our programs which instruct, enlighten, inform, and entertain, and you're invited to join us again tomorrow. This is WPBY-TV Huntington, Charleston, a West Virginia public broadcasting station. Good night.

2000s (as WPBY-TV)[]

This is West Virginia Public Broadcasting, a state network serving West Virginia. West Virginia Public Broadcasting operates the following transmitters:

WPBY Channel 33 Huntington/Charleston

WNPB Channel 24 Morgantown

WSWP Channel 9 Grandview

West Virginia Public Broadcasting also operates the following translators:

W15AD Wardensville

W17AL Mathias

W41AA Wheeling

W41AO Hampshire County

W48AA Keyser

W57AG Parkersburg

W69AC Romney
